heading: Sunday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Rain showers in the south, dissipating before midnight, scattered snow showers continuing in the north. Lows from the low 20s north, increasing to near 30 south. Southwest wind at 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Monday
text: Variable clouds in the morning, with a few snow showers in the north, then more sunshine developing in the afternoon. Colder. Highs from the mid 20s north, increasing to the mid 30s south.

heading: Monday Night
text: Mostly clear, then increasing clouds from the southwest. Much colder. Lows in the teens, single digits possible in the northeast.
